beginner.title: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
instruction: Stand tall with your feet about shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder height.
Slowly press the dumbbells upward until your arms are fully extended above your head.
Take a brief pause at the top, then gently bring the weights back down to shoulder level.
Keep your core engaged and your back straight the entire time to maintain good form.
Repeat the movement for the desired number of repetitions, keeping it steady and controlled.

beginner.title: Dumbbell Front Raise
instruction: Stand upright, holding a dumbbell in each hand with your arms hanging naturally at your sides and palms facing your torso.
Slowly lift one dumbbell up to shoulder height, keeping a slight bend in your elbow as you move.
Lower the dumbbell back down to your starting position with control.
Switch to the other hand and repeat the same movement.
Continue alternating arms until you've completed your desired number of repetitions, keeping the motion smooth and steady.

beginner.title: Dumbbell Lateral to Front Raise
instruction: Stand tall with a dumbbell in each hand, arms relaxed by your sides, and palms facing your torso.
Without moving your torso, lift the dumbbells out to your sides, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
Raise the weights until your arms are just above parallel to the floor.
Slowly lower the dumbbells back to your starting position in a controlled motion.
Repeat the movement for the recommended number of repetitions, maintaining smooth and steady form throughout.

intermediate.title: Arnold Press
instruction: Sit comfortably on a bench with back support, holding a dumbbell in each hand at chest level with your palms facing your body.
Slowly lift the dumbbells in a smooth arc, extending your arms outward and upward until theyâ€™re straight above your head.
Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, feeling the stretch.
Lower the dumbbells back down along the same arc, bringing your forearms inward so your palms face you again.
Return to the starting position and repeat for your desired number of repetitions, keeping your movements controlled and steady.

intermediate.title: Dumbbell Upright Row
instruction: Stand tall with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand in front of your thighs.
Slowly lift the dumbbells straight up towards your collarbone, keeping your elbows pointed upward.
Pause briefly at the top to feel the movement.
Lower the dumbbells back down smoothly and in a controlled way to the starting position.
Repeat for the desired number of reps, keeping your movements steady and your posture strong.

intermediate.title: Dumbbell Push Press
instruction: Hold dumbbells at shoulder height with palms facing forward.
Slightly bend your knees and push the dumbbells overhead as you straighten your legs.
Lower the dumbbells and repeat.
Repeat for the desired repetitions.

advanced.title: Dumbbell Lateral Raise Hold
instruction: Hold dumbbells in each hand and raise your arms out to the sides.
Hold this position for a few seconds.
Lower the dumbbells and repeat.
Repeat for the desired repetitions.

advanced.title: Dumbbell Clean and Press
instruction: Hold a dumbbell in each hand at your sides.
Lift the dumbbells to shoulder height, then press them overhead.
Lower the dumbbells back to your sides and repeat.
Repeat for the desired repetitions.

advanced.title: Dumbbell One-Arm Snatch
instruction: Start in a squat position holding a dumbbell with one hand.
Explosively lift the dumbbell overhead in one motion while straightening your legs.
Lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Switch sides after desired repetitions.

beginner.title: Dumbbell Chest Press
instruction: Lie on a flat surface holding a dumbbell in each hand at chest level.
Press the dumbbells upward until your arms are fully extended.
Lower them back down to chest level.
Repeat for the desired repetitions.

beginner.title: Dumbbell Fly
instruction: Lie on a flat surface holding a dumbbell in each hand with arms extended above your chest.
Lower your arms out to the sides in a wide arc.
Bring them back together above your chest.
Repeat for the desired repetitions.

beginner.title: Incline Dumbbell Press
instruction: Set up an incline surface and lie back holding dumbbells at chest height.
Press the dumbbells upward until your arms are fully extended.
Lower them back down to chest height.
Repeat for the desired repetitions.

intermediate.title: Dumbbell Squeeze Press
instruction: Lie on a flat surface holding dumbbells at chest level, pressed together.
Push the dumbbells upward while maintaining the squeeze.
Lower them back down to chest level.
Repeat for the desired repetitions.

intermediate.title: Incline Dumbbell Fly
instruction: Set up an incline bench and hold dumbbells above your chest.
Lower your arms out to the sides in a wide arc.
Bring them back together above your chest.
Repeat for the desired repetitions.

intermediate.title: Push-Up with Dumbbells
instruction: Hold dumbbells and get into a push-up position.
Perform a push-up, keeping your body straight.
Push back up and repeat.
Repeat for the desired repetitions.

advanced.title: Dumbbell Pullover
instruction: Lie on a flat surface holding one dumbbell with both hands above your chest.
Lower the dumbbell back over your head in a controlled motion.
Bring it back above your chest.
Repeat for the desired repetitions.

advanced.title: Dumbbell Deficit Push-Up
instruction: Place dumbbells on the floor and grip them while in a push-up position.
Lower your chest below the level of the dumbbells.
Push back up to the starting position.
Repeat for the desired repetitions.

advanced.title: Single-Arm Dumbbell Press
instruction: Lie on a flat surface holding a dumbbell in one hand at chest height.
Press the dumbbell upward until your arm is fully extended.
Lower it back down and repeat before switching sides.
Repeat for the desired repetitions.

beginner.title: Dumbbell Goblet Squat
instruction: Hold a dumbbell close to your chest with both hands.
Squat down until your thighs are parallel to the floor.
Stand back up and repeat.
Repeat for the desired repetitions.

beginner.title: Dumbbell Step-Up
instruction: Hold dumbbells in each hand and step onto a sturdy surface with one leg.
Step back down and repeat with the other leg.
Alternate legs for the desired repetitions.

beginner.title: Dumbbell Split Squat
instruction: Hold dumbbells in each hand and step one foot back.
Lower your back knee towards the floor, keeping your front knee over your toes.
Push back up and repeat before switching legs.
Repeat for the desired repetitions.

intermediate.title: Bulgarian Split Squat with Dumbbell
instruction: Hold a dumbbell in each hand and place one foot on a bench behind you.
Lower your body into a squat with the front leg.
Push back up and repeat before switching legs.
Repeat for the desired repetitions.

intermediate.title: Dumbbell Front Squat
instruction: Hold dumbbells at shoulder height and perform a squat.
Keep your torso upright and thighs parallel to the floor.
Return to standing and repeat.
Repeat for the desired repetitions.

intermediate.title: Dumbbell Lateral Lunge
instruction: Hold dumbbells and step to the side, bending the leading leg.
Push back to the starting position.
Repeat for the desired repetitions on each side.

advanced.title: Dumbbell Squat Jump
instruction: Hold dumbbells at your sides and perform a squat.
Explode upward into a jump, landing softly.
Repeat for the desired repetitions.

advanced.title: Dumbbell Reverse Lunge with Knee Drive
instruction: Hold dumbbells and step back into a lunge.
Drive the back knee forward and upward explosively.
Return to the lunge position and repeat.
Repeat for the desired repetitions on each leg.

advanced.title: Dumbbell Pistol Squat
instruction: Hold a dumbbell in front of you and balance on one leg.
Lower your body into a squat, keeping the other leg extended.
Push back up to the starting position.
Repeat for the desired repetitions on each leg.

beginner.title: Dumbbell Russian Twist
instruction: Sit on the floor holding a dumbbell with both hands.
Twist your torso to one side, then to the other.
Repeat for the desired repetitions.

beginner.title: Dumbbell Side Bend
instruction: Hold a dumbbell in one hand and stand upright.
Bend sideways towards the dumbbell, then return to standing.
Switch sides after the desired repetitions.

beginner.title: Weighted Leg Raise
instruction: Lie on your back holding a dumbbell between your feet.
Lift your legs upward, keeping them straight.
Lower them back down without touching the floor.
Repeat for the desired repetitions.

intermediate.title: Dumbbell Toe Touch
instruction: Lie on your back holding a dumbbell in both hands above your chest.
Raise your legs and reach the dumbbell towards your toes.
Lower back down and repeat.
Repeat for the desired repetitions.

intermediate.title: Dumbbell Weighted Sit-Up
instruction: Hold a dumbbell across your chest and lie on your back.
Perform a sit-up, bringing your torso towards your thighs.
Lower back down and repeat.
Repeat for the desired repetitions.

intermediate.title: Dumbbell Plank Row
instruction: Get into a plank position holding dumbbells.
Row one dumbbell towards your torso, keeping your core tight.
Lower it back down and repeat with the other side.
Repeat for the desired repetitions.

advanced.title: Dumbbell V-Up
instruction: Lie on your back holding a dumbbell in both hands.
Raise your legs and torso to meet in the middle, forming a 'V' shape.
Lower back down and repeat.
Repeat for the desired repetitions.

advanced.title: Dumbbell Side Plank with Reach Under
instruction: Get into a side plank position holding a dumbbell.
Reach the dumbbell under your torso and extend it back upward.
Repeat for the desired repetitions before switching sides.

advanced.title: Dumbbell Windshield Wiper
instruction: Lie on your back holding a dumbbell above your chest.
Lift your legs and move them side to side like a windshield wiper.
Return to the center and repeat.
Repeat for the desired repetitions.
